title: Common Issue 5
description: Error while running terraform: deleting Managed Kubernetes Cluster "kubernetes-aks1" (Resource Group "k8s-resources"): containerservice.ManagedClustersClient#Delete: Failure sending request: StatusCode=0 -- Original Error: autorest/azure: Service returned an error. Status=<nil> <nil>
solution: there is lock on Mc_* resource group
